title: Cherry tomato and mozzarella salad
description: This delicious salad is made from mozzarella pearls – tiny balls of mozzarella that work well in a salad with small tomatoes and basil. Each serving provides 225kcal, 12g protein, 2g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars), 18g fat (of which 9g saturates), 0.8g fibre and 0.6g salt.

default: 250g/9oz small ripe tomatoes on the vine

steps: Cut the tomatoes in half and place in a bowl with the remaining ingredients.
Season well with salt and pepper, cover and chill until ready to serve.
